description: The body of an asynchronous CSV table download job.

sql.description: The SQL to use to build the resulting CSV.

writeHeader.description: Should the first line contain the columns names as a header in the resulting file?  Set to 'true' to include the headers else, 'false'.  The default value is 'true'.

separator.description: The delimiter to used for separating entries in the resulting file. The default character ',' will be used if this is not provided by the caller.  For tab-separated values use '\t'

quoteCharacter.description: The character to used for quoted elements in the resulting file.  The default character '"' will be used if this is not provided by the caller.

escapeCharacter.description: The escape character used for escaping a separator or quote in the resulting file. The default character '\\' will be used if this is not provided by the caller.

lineEnd.description: The line feed terminator to use for the resulting file.  The default value of '\n' will be used if this is not provided by the caller.
